snippet.title: God's Trigger - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
#godstrigger #trailer #april18

God’s Trigger Descends From the Heavens in a Shower of Blood for PC, the Xbox One family of devices, including Xbox One X, and PlayStation 4 on April 18, 2019.

In this freshly forged from hellfire and blood trailer, you can glimpse some of the action to come as more of the impending top-down shooter’s storyline is revealed. 
Put simply: destroy everything in your path as quickly and stylishly as possible to stop the apocalypse, using combos, customizable special abilities, and environmental traps to your advantage.

God’s Trigger available digitally for PC, the Xbox One family of devices, including Xbox One X, and PlayStation 4 on April 18, 2019

Steam - http://bit.ly/Gods_Trigger_Steam
Website - http://bit.ly/Gods_Trigger_WebsiteRT
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/omlgames
Twitter - https://twitter.com/oml_games

Subscribe our channel for more information!

Youtube - http://bit.ly/OML_Subscribe
